00052             function                __construct()
00053             {

00055                   {
00056                         $this->BlockSettings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );

00092             function                process_package_dialog( $Str , $Changed )
00093             {
00094                   try
00095                   {
00096                         if( strpos( $Str , '{package_dialog}' ) !== false )
00097                         {
00098                               $Str = str_replace( '{package_dialog}' , '{package_dialog:p=1}' , $Str );
00099                         }
00100                         
00101                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'package_dialog' ) ; )
00102                         {
00103                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00104                               
00105                               $this->BlockSettings->set_setting( 'id' , 'package_dialog' );
00106                               $this->BlockSettings->set_setting( 'title' , 'package_dialog' );
00107                               $PackageName = 'core::package_manager::package_manager_view';
00108                               $this->BlockSettings->set_setting( 'package_name' , $PackageName );
00109                               $this->BlockSettings->set_setting( 'show_package_tree' , '1' );
00110                               
00111                               $Code = '{view_dialog:'.$this->BlockSettings->get_all_settings().'}';
00112                               $Str = str_replace( "{package_dialog:$Parameters}" , $Code , $Str );
00113                               $Changed = true;
00114                         }
00115                         
00116                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00117                   }
00118                   catch( Exception $e )
00119                   {
00120                         $Args = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $Args , $e );
00121                   }
00122             }
00123 
00154             function                process_string( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
00155             {
00156                   try
00157                   {
00158                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_package_dialog( $Str , $Changed );
00159                         
00160                         return( $Str );
00161                   }
00162                   catch( Exception $e )
00163                   {
00164                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00165                   }
00166             }
